Tactical retreat!
(You can return to the Arena
screen without losing your score
or your win chain.)

Tactical retreat can be ordered only
once per chain. If you reset your
chain, however, your tactical retreat
will once again be available for use.

Are you sure you want to reset
your chain and start over?

Tactical Retreat:
Once per chain of wins, you can
return to the Arena screen without
losing your score or your chain.
If you reset your chain, however,
your tactical retreat will become
available for use again.

The season has ended, so you
are unable to start over.
Come back and join in next season!

The number of allies you can form
a bond with has increased due to
your Feh Pass Loyalty Perks.

They're going to try cooking!
What do you think they'll make?

They prepared some nice grilled fish!
A simple yet mouth-watering meal!

They roasted a chicken to perfection!
A meal to satisfy both heart and belly!

They baked an absolutely huge cake!
If it wasn't a party already, it is now.

They're going to explore a labyrinth...
These two better watch their step!

They were unable to avoid the trap...
A good reminder to stay alert!

One dodged! As for their partner...
They both got a lesson in teamwork.

Both deflected all traps with ease!
Their hearts beat together in triumph!

A storm appeared as if from nowhere!
They took shelter beneath a tree...

They lost track of time storytelling!
Each feels closer to the other now!

Animals began gathering near them!
The company warmed their hearts!

A magnificent rainbow appeared!
They stood in awe of nature's beauty!

The day done, they set up their camp.
It appears the tent is about to go up...

Done! ...Until the tent collapsed again.
They couldn't help but crack smiles!

They erected a magnificent tent!
A good night's sleep is in store!

They set up a jaw-dropping tent!
Exhaustion will be vanquished!

They're in town on a supply run!
Confident, they dove right in, and...

All they got was...some moldy bread?!
Now they're worse off than before!

They got everything they could carry!
A job well done, worthy of pride!

They got a mountain of supplies!
They must have some god's favor!
The journey of two Heroes awaits!

Heroes Journey:
Pick two Heroes to send out.
Record their experience to get
a variety of rewards.

Memento Points:
By using 100 Memento Points,
earned by clearing maps, you can
enter a Memento Event.

Memento Events let you take
a peek at memories from the
Heroes' journey.

Rapport:
When you view memories that
two Heroes have of their journeys,
it will increase their Rapport(♥ ).

You can earn items based on the
pair's total ♥s.

Memento Logs:
Memories you've viewed will be
added to your Memento Logs.
Watch them there anytime!

There are lots of memories
to collect!

Successful Pairs:
Only the last pair of Heroes to
clear the Final Boss battle during
a season will have their exploits
recorded. Records will be kept
for up to six seasons' worth of
successful pairs.

Unit Pairs:
Any pair of Heroes can participate
in a journey. You can even use
the My Summoner unit too.

These Heroes already have max
Memento Points.

Use your Memento Points and
advance to Memento Event?

Heroes require more Memento Points
to advance to a Memento Event.

One of the Heroes in your pairing
has been lost. The team's Rapport
has been reset.

Logbooks filled with records of Heroic
journeys. Choose one and look inside!

If you change Heroes, the amount of
Rapport gained for the current Hero
pair will be reset.
Are you sure you want to proceed?
Choose Heroes to go on a journey.

You cannot place two of the same
Hero on one team.

The app was closed while a Memento
Event was being selected.
Please select a Memento Event.

The app was closed while a Memento
Event was being selected, but a Hero
in your pairing has been lost, so you
cannot resume selection. You will be
returned to the Heroes Journey menu.

Because the battle lasted past the
end of the season, the results were
not counted.

$aUntil turn $a0, after skill activation at start of
defensive turn, if raiding party is outside the
defensive team's range or is within 2 rows and
7 columns centered on structure, defensive
turn ends immediately.

Supporting an ally will boost their
stats. Do you want to support
this ally?

・ If you change which ally you're
supporting, the Support Rank with
your current ally will reset.
・ After being subscribed for two
months in a row, you can support
a fourth ally—and after three months
in a row, you can support a fifth.

a fourth ally—and after three months
in a row, you can support a fifth.
